result.name: An integrated linkage map of interspecific backcross 2 (BC2) populations reveals QTLs associated with fatty acid composition and vegetative parameters influencing compactness in oil palm
result.description: This study sought to identify quantitative trait loci (QTLs) associated with fatty acid composition (FAC) and vegetative traits for compactness in oil palm. It integrated two interspecific backcross two (BC2) mapping populations to improve the genetic resolution and evaluate the consistency of the QTLs identified.
